title: Design Auth Service Architecture & Security Strategy
description: Define interfaces for AuthService, TokenService, and CookieService. Determine RS256 key management strategy. Map out the refresh token rotation flow diagram.
acceptance_criteria: Interface definitions approved; Sequence diagram created; Threat model documented
definition_of_done: Architecture document signed off by Tech Lead
business_value: Ensures secure foundation for all user access

title: Implement JWT Token Utilities
description: Develop utility functions using `jose` library to sign Access/Refresh tokens with RS256, verify signatures, and decode payloads. Implement error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests pass for valid token signing; Expired tokens throw error; Invalid signatures rejected
definition_of_done: Code merged with 100% unit test coverage

title: Develop Login & Registration API Routes
description: Implement Next.js Route Handlers for login/register. Validate inputs with Zod. Verify password hash. Issue tokens via HttpOnly cookies.
acceptance_criteria: Valid credentials return 200; Invalid return 401 generic; Secure cookies set
definition_of_done: Integration tests passing; Security scan clean
business_value: User entry point to the system

title: Implement RBAC Middleware
description: Create Next.js middleware to intercept requests, validate JWT, check role claims, and enforce tenant isolation.
acceptance_criteria: Unauth requests redirected; Unauthorized returns 403; Tenant context injected

title: Verify Tenant Isolation Strategy
description: Create automated test suite specifically to attempt horizontal privilege escalation.
acceptance_criteria: Cross-tenant access fails; Queries verified to have merchantId scope

title: Implement Salla Authorization URL Generator
description: Create service to generate the Salla OAuth URL with secure state parameter.
acceptance_criteria: Valid URL generated; State parameter secure; State stored

title: Implement OAuth Callback & Token Exchange
description: Create API route for callback. Validate 'state'. Exchange code for tokens. Encrypt and store tokens.
acceptance_criteria: State validated; Tokens exchanged and encrypted; Errors handled
definition_of_done: Integration test with mocked Salla API passing

title: Implement Salla Webhook Handler
description: Create endpoint to receive `order.created` and `cart.updated`. Validate signature. Queue to QStash.
acceptance_criteria: Signature verified; Invalid rejected; Response < 200ms; Event queued

title: Design Historical Import Pagination Strategy
description: Analyze Salla API rate limits. Design recursive fetching logic and QStash job chaining.
acceptance_criteria: Strategy documented; Rate limit algorithm defined; Job chaining planned
business_value: Ensures reliability of massive data import

title: Implement Bulk Data Fetch Worker
description: Develop worker to fetch Orders/Customers. Transform data. Bulk upsert to Postgres. Handle 429 errors.
acceptance_criteria: Fetches pages; Transforms data; Bulk upserts; Handles 429s
definition_of_done: Integration test passing with large payload

title: Develop Sync Job Queue Orchestrator
description: Implement QStash integration to trigger worker, handle recursive chaining, and manage DLQ.
acceptance_criteria: Triggers via QStash; Queues next page; Routes failed to DLQ
definition_of_done: E2E test of job chain passing

title: Implement Sync Progress Tracking & API
description: Create logic to update sync status in DB and expose API for frontend polling.
acceptance_criteria: Progress recorded; API returns status < 100ms; Failed jobs marked

title: Design ClickHouse Schema & Ingestion Logic
description: Define Fact tables with MergeTree engine. Determine Sorting/Partition Keys.
acceptance_criteria: Schema validated; Partitioning defined; Ingestion map defined

title: Implement CDC/Polling ELT Processor
description: Develop service to fetch changes from Postgres, transform, and batch insert to ClickHouse.
acceptance_criteria: Detects changes; Transforms correctly; Inserts batches; Idempotent

title: Develop Dashboard KPI Aggregation API
description: Implement API to query ClickHouse for KPIs. Enforce merchantId. Optimize SQL.
acceptance_criteria: Aggregates correctly; Scoped to merchantId; Fast response; Handles empty states

title: Implement Sales Trend Chart Visualization
description: Develop frontend component using Recharts. Fetch data. Manage state. Render chart.
acceptance_criteria: Chart renders data; Filter updates chart; Loading state shown; Responsive

title: Data Pipeline Latency & Integrity Test
description: Automated test: Create order in Postgres, wait, query ClickHouse, assert match.
acceptance_criteria: Test passes; Latency measured; Data matches

title: Setup pgvector & Embedding Generation
description: Enable pgvector. Create table. Service to generate embeddings for Metadata using OpenAI.
acceptance_criteria: pgvector enabled; Embeddings generated; Vector search works

title: Implement RAG Service with OpenAI Integration
description: Develop service to receive query, retrieve context, construct prompt, call OpenAI, and validate SQL.
acceptance_criteria: Retrieves context; Generates valid SQL; Scopes to merchantId; Handles errors

title: Develop AI Chat Interface UI
description: Build chat UI with history, loading states, and result rendering.
acceptance_criteria: Renders messages; Shows loading; Renders results types
